snippet: Libya has given Syria’s chargé d’affaires and his staff in Tripoli 72 hours to leave the country, the Foreign Ministry said Thursday.
abstract: Libya gives Syria’s charge d’affaires and his staff in Tripoli 72 hours to leave the country.
lead_paragraph: Libya has given Syria’s chargé d’affaires and his staff in Tripoli 72 hours to leave the country, the Foreign Ministry said Thursday.
